hackathon.faq_ans: Yes, there are bunch of prizes involved and also some goodies and merchandises like t-shirts and sweatshirts
To participate in the hackathon, you must be 18 years or older, have a computer, internet connection, and a good sense of humor.

hackathon.faq_ques: When and where is the hackathon taking place?
hackathon.faq_ans: The hackathon will be taking place on October 12th, 2022 at 10:00 AM to 5:00 PM at the Technological Institute of Hamirpur, Hamirpur, India.

hackathon.faq_ques: How much does the registration fee include?
hackathon.faq_ans: The registration fee includes admission to the hackathon, food, and accommodation.

hackathon.faq_ques: What is the format of the hackathon?
hackathon.faq_ans: The hackathon will be a 3-hour event with a focus on innovation, creativity, and problem-solving.

hackathon.faq_ques: What are the rules for the hackathon?
hackathon.faq_ans: The rules for the hackathon will be provided at the beginning of the event. All participants must follow the rules to ensure a fair and enjoyable experience.

workshop.faq_ques: What are the topics for the workshops?
workshop.faq_ans: The workshops will cover various topics such as Python programming, web development, machine learning, and data analysis.

workshop.faq_ans: The workshop registration is completely free.

workshop.faq_ans: To attend the workshops, you must have a computer, internet connection, and a good sense of humor.

workshop.faq_ans: Attending the workshops will help you learn new skills, expand your knowledge, and have a fun and engaging experience.

coding_contest.faq_ans: Some common coding problems to solve include sorting arrays, finding the maximum value, and implementing a binary search algorithm.
